wiki.summary: "Miracle" is a song by Calvin Harris and Ellie Goulding. It was released on 10 March 2023 through Sony. The song marks their third collaboration, following "I Need Your Love" (2013) and "Outside" (2014). The song debuted at #3 and later reached #1 on the UK singles chart, making it Calvin's 11th and Ellie's fourth song to reach that milestone on the chart. Read more on Last.fm.
